entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call is very important to us. Please hold while we connect you with the next available agent.
Thank you for calling VeloFit, my name is Alex. How can I help you today?
Yes, hi. I want to return something. I bought a VeloBand Pulse a little over two weeks ago, and it's just not working out for me. It's uncomfortable, and I just don't like it.
Okay, I understand. Can you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your VeloFit account?
It's [customer's email address].
Thank you. Okay, I see the order here with the VeloBand Pulse. According to our records, it was purchased 15 days ago.
Yeah, so? I want to return it.
I understand. However, our standard return window for the VeloBand Pulse and all of our wearable technology is 10 days. Unfortunately, you are outside of that timeframe.
What? Are you serious? Ten days? That's ridiculous! I didn't see that anywhere. I want my money back. This is unacceptable.

I apologize for the inconvenience. The return policy is outlined on our website and also detailed in the email confirmation you received when you placed the order. While a full refund isn't possible since it is outside the return window, let me see if I can offer you something else.
I don't want to hear excuses. I just want to return it. This whole thing is just bad business practice.

I understand your frustration, and I want to help find a solution. While I can't process a standard return, I can offer you store credit for the full purchase price of the VeloBand Pulse. You can use this credit to purchase another item from VeloFit that better suits your needs. Let me see if I can make a policy exception for that.
Store credit? Hmm... So I can get something else? Are you sure?
Yes, I can make that happen. A store credit for the full amount of the VeloBand Pulse will be applied to your account immediately. You can use it anytime. Does that sound acceptable?
Okay, alright, that's… better than nothing, I guess. So, how do I use the store credit?
The store credit will automatically be applied to your next purchase when you are logged into your account. You'll see it reflected at checkout. You don't need a code or anything.
Okay, great. Thank you so much. I appreciate you making that exception. I'll check out the website now.
You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thanks again for your help!
You're very welcome. Have a great day, and thank you for choosing VeloFit!
